tool.name: analyze_layout_tool
tool.description: Specialized tool for analyzing document images to extract layout structure and spatial organization. ONLY use for: document layout analysis, page structure identification, spatial organization analysis, column detection, text block positioning, visual hierarchy analysis, document formatting analysis, and spatial relationship mapping. NOT for: content extraction, text transcription, diagrams, tables, or handwriting analysis. If no layout structure is found, returns that no layout content was detected and suggests checking with user for appropriate tool selection.

image_path.description: Absolute file path to the image containing document layout to analyze. Supports common image formats (PNG, JPG, etc.)

aws_profile.description: Optional AWS profile name for Bedrock authentication. If not provided, uses default AWS credentials

audit_mode.description: When true, includes confidence scoring and human review flags in the analysis output

analyzer.name: layout_analyzer
analyzer.description: Analyzes document images to extract layout structure and spatial organization

core.text: Were all visual elements correctly identified?
Was the content understood within its surrounding context?
What elements were missed or incorrectly represented?

tool_specific.text: Were spatial positions and relationships correctly identified?
Were columns and text blocks correctly detected?
Was the visual hierarchy accurately represented?
